text: yutarkalil cilar veta vakkukalin (karuttai) atarkuriya itattiliruntu purattukinranar;. (Innum um'mai nokki, 'napiye! Nir connatai) nam kettom, atarku marakave ceyvom;, innum (nam kuruvatai) nir kelum; (nir kuruvatu) ceviyeratu pokattum!' Enru kuri, 'rayina' enru tankal navukalaik konikkontu (peci) canmarkkattaip palikkinranar;. (Anal itarkup patilaka) avarkal"nam ceviyerrom, innum (umakku) nankal valippattom;" (innum nam colvatai) kelunkal;, enkalai anpotu kavaniyunkal, (ullurna) enru kuriyirupparkalanal, atu avarkalukku nanmaiyakavum, mikka nermaiyakavum iruntirukkum-anal avarkalutaiya kuhprin (nirakarippin) karanamaka, allah avarkalaic capittu vittan;.
